title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2014 CryptoImperator 10,000 bits coin + "DIY" stamped hologram*This is one of only 50 coins produced this way by CI*LOT 2: 2019 MoonBits 1k bits, gold finish #T3160 "14h4fP3U"LOT 3: 2019 MoonBits 1k bits, silver finish #T4058 "144jWLQU"*Each MoonBit chip will come with a bonus MoonBits flyer*STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 14th, 2022, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 1: 0.0016 btcA word about these Moonbits flyers: They were a limited run of 250 (+ some, as we had a version with a misspelling that was unnoticed for a short while). I've around 40 left and usually send 1 or 2 out with any crypto related parcels. No re-prints are planned so far and if ever, it will be an updated version (date and some changes).
